Title: Torrent Description Generator
Description:
A simple WPF application to generate a robust torrent description for movies in text or bbcode.
Includes file info, thumbs, imdb/RT links and poster.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project seeks to combine several available services into a more comprehensive package.

When finished the project will provide the user the ability to open a video file and provide the name of a movie and have the app;
Pull all file data out, like aspect ratio, format, video and audio codec, bitrate, etc
Generate several thumbnails
Pull a poster image,
Pull a movie summary and top actors from themoviedb or imdb
Generate links for themoviedb, imdb, rottentomatoes etc
Upload images to tinypic or twitpic
Pull it all together into a well formed bbcode or plain text post for copying.
